nodes.text: I've saved Joel!
Excellent. What happened to our wayward rogue?
You see, Joel was trapped in the Catacombs by a Wraith...
So Herr Kyro said that Herr Sosi left Joel behind in the Catacombs?
Yes, funny how Sosi had no idea what had happened to Joel...
I believe that I shall have to have a conversation with Herr Sosi.

options.text: Tell About Joel and the Wraith

nodes.text: I think I've found Joel in the Catacombs, but he's trapped there by a Wraith...
A Wraith is not something to face without a great deal of magical protections and special offensive weapons. We need to call upon an expert in this situation.
Go and speak to Lady Moira - she will know how to handle such a thing. I hope she will be there in time.

options.text: Ask About the Master and Kyro

nodes.text: Are you concerned about Joel?
Herr Kyro is a Rogue. As I said in class, Rogues take care of other Rogues. I will be searching for him shortly. I suggest that you do the same.
Do you think Joel is in danger?
Herr Kyro is a good student who excels in thief skills. I believe that this class has been good for him. I do not think that he would willingly miss this class.
I find it very odd that Herr Kyro did not speak with Herr Sosi before leaving the school...
Do you think that Sosi knows more about the matter than he's saying?
I sincerely hope that Herr Sosi is telling the truth about his ignorance...
What kind of danger do you think Joel could be in?
You have had the opportunity to know Joel better than I - what do you think?

options.text: Talk About Sosi Pressuring Joel with Sea Caves

nodes.text: Some nights ago, I heard Sosi ordering Joel to go into the Sea Caves to look for pirate treasure. Joel sounded pretty scared.
I believe that I shall have a long conversation with Herr Sosi...

options.text: Talk About Joel Mentioning the Catacombs to Sosi

nodes.text: Sosi bullies Joel all the time into doing things Joel doesn't want to do. I overheard Joel telling Sosi about a treasure in the Catacombs so that Joel wasn't forced go to the Sea Caves.
The Catacombs are extremely dangerous for treasure seekers! The Undead do not gladly give up what little they have left of their former lives.

options.text: Talk About Joel's Fear of the Catacombs

nodes.text: I overheard Joel telling Sosi how dangerous the Catacombs are right now. He said that there are many restless ghosts this near to the 'Nights of the Dead.' But Sosi ordered Joel to go back to the Catacombs anyway.
Verdammt! If Herr Kyro did indeed go to the Catacombs, then he is in deadly peril, assuming that he still lives.
I shall speak with the others about this information. Thank you for coming to me about this matter.
<shrug> I really don't know where he is right now.
Why do I need to use magic?

You may not 'need' to use magic as long as you are cautious. However, magic is necessary against certain traps and creatures. It is very difficult to sneak past the Undead and even more difficult to destroy them.
I guess I should have taken more time doing my essay...
You could hardly have taken less.
Good day, sir.
Search for Herr Kyro... but try not to get into too much danger in doing so.
I'll handle it, sir.
Good day, sir.
Guten Tag.
